name: 3D Pool Master 8 Ball Pro
description:
Play Masters 8 Ball Pool Pro on your device and enjoy the fun and excitement of crushing opponents in of the best billiards game on the market. Tap to aim and shoot in this amazing 8 Ball Pool game. Play 1 on 1 mode and crush your friends on every billiards game, or play Player vs Cpu mode and test your billiards skills against the AI. Enjoy our third 8 ball pool play mode, in which you can practice your billiards skills on your own. Earn coins as a reward for crushing opponents, and spend those coins to buy some billiards pro cues. Either if you crush the AI or crush your friends, fun is guaranteed in this awesome 8 ball pool game! Try it out now!

Features:
- Physics-based 8 ball pool game.
- 3 play modes.
- Great sounds and graphics.
- Amazing playability.
